# Google ADK Extras

> Production-ready services, credentials, and FastAPI wiring for Google ADK

Production-ready services, credential flows (OAuth2/JWT/Basic), and FastAPI wiring for Google ADK.
Durable backends for sessions, artifacts, and memory with simple URI config and a fluent builder.


## Overview

- [Overview](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/google-adk-extras/index.md): Overview & value proposition

## Getting Started

- [Getting Started](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/google-adk-extras/getting-started/index.md)

## Quickstarts

- [Quickstarts](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/google-adk-extras/quickstarts/index.md)

- [FastAPI Integration](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/google-adk-extras/fastapi/index.md)

## Services

- [Credentials](https://deadmeme5441.github.io/google-adk-extras/credentials/index.md): Credential services (OAuth2/JWT/Basic)
